entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 7:31 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:31 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
